description:
Brendan has been getting fucked A LOT lately. As funny as it sounds, he considers himself a "straight bottom." OK, I know, but this time he was in the mood to FUCK.
Troy is a bit unconventional. He's in a completely different ballpark compared to the other guys on this site, but I for one think it's been a riot seeing this Texas cowboy explore his sexuality.
Both of them were excited to get going. We asked Troy how he felt about taking the role that Brendan usually takes:
"It's OK," Troy said. "I'm from Texas. I'm used to taking all the attention!"
title: Troy & Brendan
